Name: zul-iqembulezifundi
Author: Iqembu Lezifundiswa, Mussa Muhammad Telela , Uthman Mfanafuthi Msomi, Moulana Abdur Rahman Chilipa, Haji Ibrahim Mondli Japhet Mthembu, Moulana Imran Ngcobo, Moulana Eshaaq Osman
Source: Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa(IDM), https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Kanjalo akuzange kufike kulabo ababengaphambilini kwabo isithunywa ngaphandle kokuthi bathi, “umlumbi noma uhlanya”
Ngakube babelana ngako njengefa, kepha bona bangabantu abanephutha (abonayo)
Ngakho-ke bafulathele (suka kubona), wena awusiyena ofanelwe ukusolwa
Futhi khumbuza ngoba ngempela ukukhumbuza kuyabazuzisa abakholwayo
Futhi angizange ngidale amajinn(imimoya) nabantu ngaphandle kokuthi bangikhonze
Angisifuni kubona isabelo futhi angifuni ukuthi bangondle
Ngempela uMvelinqangi nguyena onika isabelo, umnikazi wamandla oqatha
Futhi ngempela okwalabo abenza okubi yingxenye efana nengxenye yabangane babo, ngakho-ke abangangiceli ukuthi ngisheshise
Futhi usizi kulabo abangakholwanga osukwini labo abathenjiswa lona
Ngifunga ngentaba
Ngifunga nencwadi elotshiwe
Ekhasini elivulekile
Ngifunga nangendlu yokukhonzela (izingelosi)
Ngifunga nangophahla oluphakanyisiwe
Ngifunga nangolwandle olugcwele luphuphuma
Ngempela isijeziso seNkosi yakho sizokwenzeka
Akekho ongasivimba
Khumbula	usuku	lapho	izulu	liyobe	lizamazama ngokuzamazama (okunamandla)
Futhi izintaba ziyogudluka ukugudluka (okubi) ziyodilika zibe wuthuli
Ngakho-ke usizi ngalolosuku kwabaphikayo
Labo, bona abadlalayo enkulumweni
Ngosuku abayolethwa ngalo emlilweni wesihogo belethwa ngokuphoqwa
Lona ngumlilo nina enanijwayele ukuwuphika
